Topic.Title: The Truth About Marissa Mayer's Surprise Deal With Google

Topic.Title: why that Balmer is both a #$%$ and a craftsman

Message.Msg: For all of those that disagrees. Yahoo is the ONLY real solid worldwide media portal on the internet. Ever think about why the Google guys never even try to sue Mayer when she took employees from Google? Does that ring a bell? Why Dan Loeb would allow to hire someone like Mayer, who really has no turn around experience? Ever ask those obvious questions? Google can not outright buy Yahoo, because that would make an antitrust issue. So what it could do is to infiltrate the Company with its own employees and then start to build relationships. Is that good for Yahoo share holders? Of course, it is. Great for Yahoo share holders, but horrible for MSFT. MSFT is doing the similar thing with Nokia... it is the new business strategy. In the end, you will see a great synergy between Google and Yahoo, which Apple and MSFT should fear very very much.

Topic.Title: aapl ceo might be scared?

Message.Msg: How is Marissa a "threat" to anyone's job when she hasn't did anything HERE so far to impact revenue in a meaningful way and profits? Yahoo forecasted DOWN for the year afterall. A CEO who hasn't did anything but a hypothetical buyout is worthy of the top job at those companies?hahahahaha I like Marissa but running a $5B company is vastly different then ones with revenue of $250 BILLION and $70 BILLION respectively. She wouldn't even be a regional president in the Ipad division and certainly not a division head at MSFT's Servers division, which I think is one of the 5 with $10B+ in revenues per year. As for Gates, he hasn't been involved in over a decade since he was CEO and almost a decade since he became Chairman Emeritus. His wealth ISN'T even in Microsoft, something like 80-85% has been cashed out. His focus has been his 2 Gates charities which btw. are bigger than Yahoo today. The irony is BOTH of those companies have grown substantially in the last 5yrs whereas Yahoo has gone the other way 30%.
